page.title: 08TONMAWR - LACK OF AMENITIES
page.content: It is worth noting some of the facilities normally easily available to townspeople which are not part of Tonmawr Village: 1.)although newspapers can be ordered and then delivered to your house, there are no newspapers, magazines or books available for casual purchase anywhere in the village. 2.) The nearest library is in Neath. A mobile library visits the village once every two weeks, staying there for 20 minutes before moving on. 3.) There is no chemist.. people have to travel into Neath to cash prescriptions. 4.) No butcher ... fresh meat is not sold.
